info.name: mrbohnke's Inoreader Awesomizer
info.description:
Several style adjustments for a better reading experience, including some margin, placement and font-size fixes here and there, plus articles font-sizes, font-weights and image widths.
Also, the top bar is slightly hidden away, you can summon it hovering the top side of the page.

# I use this with a 150% browser zoom, it looks gorgeous that way.
